00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "ImgDiffs"
00022 
00023 #include "imgdiffs.h"
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00026 
00027 void compressImgLine(RImage::Type type, uint8_t** rows, int y, int width, vector<uint8_t>& cLine)
00028 {
00029     switch (type) {
00030         case RImage::C8: {
00031         #if RLE_MODE == 2
00032             int x = 0;
00033             while (x < width) {
00034                 uint8_t color = rows[y][x];
00035                 uint8_t count = 0;
00036                 do { count++; x++; } while (x < width && color == rows[y][x] && count < 255);
00037                 cLine.push_back(color);
00038                 cLine.push_back(count-1);   // 0 means 1
00039             }
00040         #elif RLE_MODE == 1
00041             int x = 0;
00042             while (x < width) {
00043                 uint8_t color = rows[y][x];
00044                 uint8_t count = 0;
00045                 do { count++; x++; } while (x < width && color == rows[y][x] && count < 31);
00046                 cLine.push_back(((reduceC8(color)&7)|((count-1)<<3)));  // count = 0 means 1
00047             }
00048         #else
00049             for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) cLine.push_back(rows[y][x]);
00050         #endif
00051             
00052         } break;
00053 
00054         case RImage::RGB32: {
00055             int x = 0;
00056             while (x < width) {
00057                 int xx = x*RImage::getBytesPerPixel(type);
00058                 cLine.push_back(rows[y][xx]);
00059                 cLine.push_back(rows[y][xx+1]);
00060                 cLine.push_back(rows[y][xx+2]);
00061                 x++;
00062             }
00063         } break;
00064 
00065         default: {
00066             int x = 0;
00067             while (x < width) {
00068                 int xx = x * RImage::getBytesPerPixel(type);
00069                 for (size_t i = 0; i < RImage::getBytesPerPixel(type); i++) {
00070                     cLine.push_back(rows[y][xx+i]);
00071                 }
00072                 x++;
00073             }
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 void uncompressImgDiffCBuf(const vector<uint8_t>& cBuf, RImageDiffRect* diff)
00079 {
00080     int x = 0, y = 0, diffCursor = 0;
00081     uint8_t** px = diff->getPixels();
00082     switch (diff->refImageType) {
00083         case RImage::C8: {
00084         #if RLE_MODE == 2
00085             while (y < diff->rectHeight) {
00086                 uint8_t color = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00087                 uint8_t count = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00088                 for (size_t i = 0; i < (uint) count+1; i++) {
00089                     if (y >= diff->rectHeight) {
00090                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Diff buffer gone past image end");
00091                         break;
00092                     }
00093                     px[y][x] = color;
00094                     if (++x >= diff->rectWidth) { x = 0; y++; }
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         #elif RLE_MODE == 1
00098             while (y < diff->rectHeight) {
00099                 uint8_t color = expandC8((cBuf[diffCursor])&7);
00100                 uint8_t count = (cBuf[diffCursor++])>>3;
00101                 for (size_t i = 0; i < (uint) count+1; i++) {
00102                     if (y >= diff->rectHeight) {
00103                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Diff buffer gone past image end");
00104                         break;
00105                     }
00106                     px[y][x] = color;
00107                     if (++x >= diff->rectWidth) { x = 0; y++; }
00108                 }
00109             }
00110         #else
00111             while (y < diff->rectHeight) {
00112                 px[y][x] = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00113                 if (++x >= diff->rectWidth) { x = 0; y++; }
00114             }
00115         #endif
00116         } break;
00117 
00118         case RImage::RGB32: {
00119             while (y < diff->rectHeight) {
00120                 int xx = x*RImage::getBytesPerPixel(diff->refImageType);
00121                 px[y][xx] = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00122                 px[y][xx+1] = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00123                 px[y][xx+2] = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00124                 if (++x >= diff->rectWidth) { x = 0; y++; }
00125             }
00126         } break;
00127 
00128         default: {
00129             while (y < diff->rectHeight) {
00130                 px[y][x] = cBuf[diffCursor++];
00131                 if (++x >= diff->rectWidth) { x = 0; y++; }
00132             }
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }
